description: This file defines API routes for payment operations in a FastAPI application, including payment initiation and webhook handling.

methods.name: initiate_payment(body: PaymentInit, user=Depends(require_role(Role.PASSENGER)))
methods.description: Handles payment initiation for a completed ride; returns a payment reference.

methods.name: payment_webhook(x_signature: Optional[str] = Header(default=None), ref: Optional[str] = None, status: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Processes payment provider callbacks to update payment status.

calls: next((p for p in PAYMENTS.values() if p.provider_ref == ref), None)

ctags.name: payment_webhook
ctags.pattern: /^def payment_webhook(x_signature: Optional[str] = Header(default=None), ref: Optional[str] = None/
ctags.signature: (x_signature: Optional[str] = Header(default=None), ref: Optional[str] = None, status: Optional[str] = None)
